articles.description: Former Leeds Rhinos star Rob Burrow, who was diagnosed with motor neurone disease in 2019, has died at the age of 41.
articles.title: Rob Burrow: Leeds Rhinos announce death of rugby league star

articles.description: West Indies face Papua New Guinea in the Men's T20 World Cup in Guyana - follow text updates, video highlights and radio commentary.
articles.title: West Indies vs Papua New Guinea LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe will join Real Madrid on a free transfer from Paris St-Germain when the La Liga transfer window opens on 1 July.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: France forward signs Real Madrid contract to join on free transfer

articles.description: Wimbledon champion Carlos Alcaraz sweeps past Felix Auger-Aliassime to set up a French Open quarter-final against 2021 runner-up Stefanos Tsitsipas.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz and Stefanos Tsitsipas reach men's quarter-finals

articles.description: Real Madrid show they are the masters of the Champions League high-wire act as Borussia Dortmund are beaten at Wembley, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Champions League final: Real Madrid pull off another high-wire act to win

articles.description: After Novak Djokovic clinched a French Open victory at 3am, fellow top players Coco Gauff and Iga Swiatek say late finishes must be stopped.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic finishing at 3am in Paris is 'unhealthy', says Coco Gauff

articles.description: Aaron Jones hits an unbeaten 94 as T20 World Cup co-hosts USA beat Canada by seven wickets in a pulsating tournament opener in Texas.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: USA beat Canada in tournament opener

articles.description: Iga Swiatek takes just 40 minutes to register a crushing 6-0 6-0 win over Anastasia Potapova and reach the French Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Iga Swiatek wins 6-0 6-0 in 40 minutes to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: BBC Sport asks Real Madrid fans and experts what new signing Kylian Mbappe will bring to the Bernabeu, as the French forward joins from Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe signs for Real Madrid: Mbappe makes Real 'almost impossible to stop'

articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps has been forced to withdraw from Sarina Wiegman's squad for Tuesday's Euro 2025 qualifier in France.
articles.title: Mary Earps: Man Utd goalkeeper withdraws from England squad with hip injury
